ingredients: 1 cup uncooked Acini de Pepe pasta
1 can mandarin oranges, cut into pieces
directions: Cook Acini de Pepe pasta in water, drain, and let cool.  Mix together sugar and flour in saucepan.  Add pineapple and lemon juice and egg yolk and beat well.  Heat to boiling for 5 minutes, then cool.  Add whipped cream, then rushed pineapple, oranges, and marshmallows.

Mix together sugar and flour in saucepan.  Add pineapple and lemon juice and egg yolk and beat well.  Heat to boiling for 5 minutes, then cool.  Add whipped cream, fruit cocktail (note: pick the grapes out and substitute them with fresh grapes for a better flavor), cherries, pineapple chunks, bananas, and mandarin oranges.  Pour into 9x13 banking pan a freeze for 24 hours.
Put almonds and sugar in small pan.  Cook over medium heat until sugar dissolves and coats almonds, stirring constantly.  Pour onto wax paper to cool. Toss ingredients together.

ingredients: 1/3 cup fresh dill or chives, finely chopped
directions: Wash cucumbers under very hot water to remove wax coating, remove ends and thinly slice.  Toss onion with salt and cucumber.  Press in colander to remove as much juice as possible.  Transfer cucumbers and onions back to large bowl.  Toss with remaining ingredients.  Pack tightly in quart jar until serving.  Makes 8 servings.
